content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'rawdata_adcdlstorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [rawdata_adcdlstorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://rawdata@adcdlstorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE vaccine (
	[vaccine_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[us_price] nvarchar(4000),
	[eu_price] nvarchar(4000),
	[doses_required] nvarchar(4000),
	[days_apart] nvarchar(4000) 
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'price_vaccines.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [rawdata_adcdlstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM vaccine
GO
